page.title: 03The Lea Valley
page.content: The Lea Valley Regional Parks Authority has improved leisure facilities in our area in the past twenty years. At the old mill meadows at Broxbourne there is an old water mill and a slipway for launching small boats. By the mill stream there are four chalets which can be rented throughout the summer. There is also a circular nature trail which has been designed to include as many birds and plants as possible. Following the stream round to the main river there is a boat centre. Here it is possible to hire canoes, rowing boats, motor boats and luxury narrow boats that sleep four people. There is also a waterbus which makes river trips during the summer. On the opposite bank there is a new indoor fun-pool called the Lido.
